header.description: Integration for WebSphere Message Broker to deploy Broker Archives and start and stop Message Flows using the CMP API. This plugin is compatible with both version 9 and 10 of IBM Integration Bus, and is also compatible with versions 7 and 8 of WebSphere Message Broker.

step-type.name: Set Broker Properties
step-type.description: Set Runtime Properties for the broker.

property-ui.label: Properties
property-ui.description: A new line separated list of properties to set in the format name=value

property-ui.label: IP
property-ui.description: The ip address of the target server for a remote connection.

property-ui.label: Port
property-ui.description: The port of the target server for a remote connection.

property-ui.label: Use SSL
property-ui.description: Administration security authentication/authorization. This option is only available in IIB version 10.

property-ui.label: Integration Node Name
property-ui.description: Name of Integration Node. Specify this value to create a local broker connection.

property-ui.label: Channel
property-ui.description: The name of the channel to use. Must be defined on the queue manager. Specify this value if you are using below version 10 of IIB.

property-ui.label: Queue Manager
property-ui.description: The WebSphere MQ Queue Manager which the broker is using. Specify this value if you are using below version 10 of IIB.

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: Username for secure authentication. Explicit user authentication only available with IIB 10.

property-ui.label: Password
property-ui.description: Password for secure authentication. Explicit user authentication only available with IIB 10.

property-ui.label: Trace File
property-ui.description: The file to use for trace logging. If not set trace logging will be disabled.

property-ui.label: IBM Integration Bus Version
property-ui.description: The version of IBM Integration Bus. This determines which API will be required. (i.e. 7.0.0.1, 8.0.0.1, 9.0.0.1, or 10.0.0.1)

property-ui.label: Jar Path
property-ui.description: The full path containing the specific jars required for your version of IBM Integration Bus. Version 10 requires the IntegrationAPI.jar (e.g. C:\Program Files\IBM\MQSI\7.0\classes\IntegrationAPI.jar). IIB Versions below 10 require both ConfigManagerProxy.jar and com.ibm.mq.jar (e.g C:\ProgramFiles\IBM\WebSphere MQ\java\lib\ConfigManagerProxy.jar:C:\Program Files\IBM\WebSphere MQ\java\lib\com.ibm.mq.jar)

property-ui.label: MQSIPROFILE Executable
property-ui.description: The absolute path to the mqsiprofile executable on your IIB server. Specifying this value will initialize your command environment. Only specify this path if your command environment needs initializing.

property-ui.label: Shell
property-ui.description: Path to your shell executable file.

step-type.name: Create Execution Group
step-type.description: Create an execution group only if it doesn't exist.

property-ui.label: Execution Group
property-ui.description: Name of the Execution Group to create if it does not exist.

property-ui.label: IP
property-ui.description: The ip address of the target server for a remote connection.

property-ui.label: Port
property-ui.description: The port of the target server for a remote connection.

property-ui.label: Use SSL
property-ui.description: Administration security authentication/authorization. This option is only available in IIB version 10.

property-ui.label: Integration Node Name
property-ui.description: Name of Integration Node. Specify this value to create a local broker connection.

property-ui.label: Channel
property-ui.description: The name of the channel to use. Must be defined on the queue manager. Specify this value if you are using below version 10 of IIB.

property-ui.label: Queue Manager
property-ui.description: The WebSphere MQ Queue Manager which the broker is using. Specify this value if you are using below version 10 of IIB.

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: Username for secure authentication. Explicit user authentication only available with IIB 10.

property-ui.label: Password
property-ui.description: Password for secure authentication. Explicit user authentication only available with IIB 10.

property-ui.label: Trace File
property-ui.description: The file to use for trace logging. If not set trace logging will be disabled.

property-ui.label: IBM Integration Bus Version
property-ui.description: The version of IBM Integration Bus. This determines which API will be required. (i.e. 7.0.0.1, 8.0.0.1, 9.0.0.1, or 10.0.0.1)

property-ui.label: Jar Path
property-ui.description: The full path containing the specific jars required for your version of IBM Integration Bus. Version 10 requires the IntegrationAPI.jar (e.g. C:\Program Files\IBM\MQSI\7.0\classes\IntegrationAPI.jar). IIB Versions below 10 require both ConfigManagerProxy.jar and com.ibm.mq.jar (e.g C:\ProgramFiles\IBM\WebSphere MQ\java\lib\ConfigManagerProxy.jar:C:\Program Files\IBM\WebSphere MQ\java\lib\com.ibm.mq.jar)

property-ui.label: MQSIPROFILE Executable
property-ui.description: The absolute path to the mqsiprofile executable on your IIB server. Specifying this value will initialize your command environment. Only specify this path if your command environment needs initializing.

property-ui.label: Shell
property-ui.description: Path to your shell executable file.

step-type.name: Set Execution Group Properties
step-type.description: Set runtime properties for an execution group.

property-ui.label: Execution Group
property-ui.description: Name of the Execution Group to Deploy to.

property-ui.label: Properties
property-ui.description: A new line separated list of properties to set in the format name=value

property-ui.label: IP
property-ui.description: The ip address of the target server for a remote connection.

property-ui.label: Port
property-ui.description: The port of the target server for a remote connection.

property-ui.label: Use SSL
property-ui.description: Administration security authentication/authorization. This option is only available in IIB version 10.

property-ui.label: Integration Node Name
property-ui.description: Name of Integration Node. Specify this value to create a local broker connection.

property-ui.label: Channel
property-ui.description: The name of the channel to use. Must be defined on the queue manager. Specify this value if you are using below version 10 of IIB.

property-ui.label: Queue Manager
property-ui.description: The WebSphere MQ Queue Manager which the broker is using. Specify this value if you are using below version 10 of IIB.

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: Username for secure authentication. Explicit user authentication only available with IIB 10.

property-ui.label: Password
property-ui.description: Password for secure authentication. Explicit user authentication only available with IIB 10.

property-ui.label: Trace File
property-ui.description: The file to use for trace logging. If not set trace logging will be disabled.

property-ui.label: IBM Integration Bus Version
property-ui.description: The version of IBM Integration Bus. This determines which API will be required. (i.e. 7.0.0.1, 8.0.0.1, 9.0.0.1, or 10.0.0.1)

property-ui.label: Jar Path
property-ui.description: The full path containing the specific jars required for your version of IBM Integration Bus. Version 10 requires the IntegrationAPI.jar (e.g. C:\Program Files\IBM\MQSI\7.0\classes\IntegrationAPI.jar). IIB Versions below 10 require both ConfigManagerProxy.jar and com.ibm.mq.jar (e.g C:\ProgramFiles\IBM\WebSphere MQ\java\lib\ConfigManagerProxy.jar:C:\Program Files\IBM\WebSphere MQ\java\lib\com.ibm.mq.jar)

property-ui.label: MQSIPROFILE Executable
property-ui.description: The absolute path to the mqsiprofile executable on your IIB server. Specifying this value will initialize your command environment. Only specify this path if your command environment needs initializing.

property-ui.label: Shell
property-ui.description: Path to your shell executable file.

step-type.name: Set Message Flows Properties
step-type.description: Sets runtime properties on a list of message flows.

property-ui.label: Directory Offset
property-ui.description: Path under the current working directory where you want the step to execute. Absolute paths are not allowed.

property-ui.label: Execution Group
property-ui.description: Name of the Execution Group to Deploy to.

property-ui.label: Message Flows
property-ui.description: A new line separated list of message flows.

property-ui.label: Properties
property-ui.description: A new line separated list of properties to set in the format name=value

property-ui.label: Property File
property-ui.description: Specify the name and path to a property file to use as a source of the properties instead of explicitly listing the properties in the Properties field and the flows in the Message Flows field. The property file would be the same format as the one used by the mqsiapplybaroverride command.

property-ui.label: IP
property-ui.description: The ip address of the target server for a remote connection.

property-ui.label: Port
property-ui.description: The port of the target server for a remote connection.

property-ui.label: Use SSL
property-ui.description: Administration security authentication/authorization. This option is only available in IIB version 10.

property-ui.label: Integration Node Name
property-ui.description: Name of Integration Node. Specify this value to create a local broker connection.

property-ui.label: Channel
property-ui.description: The name of the channel to use. Must be defined on the queue manager. Specify this value if you are using below version 10 of IIB.

property-ui.label: Queue Manager
property-ui.description: The WebSphere MQ Queue Manager which the broker is using. Specify this value if you are using below version 10 of IIB.

property-ui.label: Username
property-ui.description: Username for secure authentication. Explicit user authentication only available with IIB 10.

property-ui.label: Password
property-ui.description: Password for secure authentication. Explicit user authentication only available with IIB 10.

property-ui.description: The file to use for trace logging. If not set trace logging will be disabled.

property-ui.description: The full path containing the specific jars required for your version of IBM Integration Bus. Version 10 requires the IntegrationAPI.jar (e.g. C:\Program Files\IBM\MQSI\7.0\classes\IntegrationAPI.jar). IIB Versions below 10 require both ConfigManagerProxy.jar and com.ibm.mq.jar (e.g C:\ProgramFiles\IBM\WebSphere MQ\java\lib\ConfigManagerProxy.jar:C:\Program Files\IBM\WebSphere MQ\java\lib\com.ibm.mq.jar)

property-ui.label: MQSIPROFILE Executable
property-ui.description: The absolute path to the mqsiprofile executable on your IIB server. Specifying this value will initialize your command environment. Only specify this path if your command environment needs initializing.

property-ui.label: Shell
property-ui.description: Path to your shell executable file.

step-type.name: Delete Flows Using RegEx
step-type.description: Delete WMB flows that have been deployed using a BAR file matching the given regular expression. Useful for deploying into shared execution groups.

property-ui.label: RegEx
property-ui.description: Java compliant regular expression for matching the BAR file name of deployed flows.

property-ui.label: Execution Group
property-ui.description: Name of the Execution Group to Deploy to.

property-ui.label: Timeout
property-ui.description: The timeout to wait for each bar file deploy result to come back in Milliseconds. Defaults to 60000

property-ui.label: IP
property-ui.description: The ip address of the target server for a remote connection.

property-ui.label: Port
property-ui.description: The port of the target server for a remote connection.

step-type.name: Create Or Update Configurable Service
step-type.description: Create a configurable service if it doesn't exist. If it does, update its properties.

property-ui.label: Service Name
property-ui.description: The name of the service to be created or updated

property-ui.label: Service Type
property-ui.description: The type of the service. If there is a service matching Service Name that is not of this type, the step will fail.

property-ui.label: Properties
property-ui.description: A new line separated list of properties to set in the format name->value

property-ui.label: IP
property-ui.description: The ip address of the target server for a remote connection.

property-ui.label: Port

step-type.name: Deploy

property-ui.label: Bar File Names
property-ui.description: Comma-separated list of Broker Archive files to deploy.

property-ui.label: Execution Group
property-ui.description: Name of the Execution Group to Deploy to.

property-ui.label: Full Deploy
property-ui.description: If true empties Execution Group before Deploy.

property-ui.label: Timeout
property-ui.description: The timeout to wait for each bar file deploy result to come back in Milliseconds. Defaults to 60000

property-ui.label: Start/Stop Message Flows
property-ui.description: Check to stop all Message Flows in the Execution Group before deployment and start all Message Flows after deployment.

property-ui.label: IP
property-ui.description: The ip address of the target server for a remote connection.

property-ui.description: The port of the target server for a remote connection.

step-type.name: Start Message Flows
step-type.description: Start Message Flows that are stopped.

property-ui.label: Execution Group
property-ui.description: Name of the Execution Group.

property-ui.label: Message Flows
property-ui.description: NewLine-separated list of Message Flow names to start.

property-ui.label: IP
property-ui.description: The ip address of the target server for a remote connection.

property-ui.label: Port
property-ui.description: The port of the target server for a remote connection.

property-ui.label: Use SSL
property-ui.description: Administration security authentication/authorization. This option is only available in IIB version 10.

property-ui.label: Integration Node Name
property-ui.description: Name of Integration Node. Specify this value to create a local broker connection.

property-ui.label: Channel
property-ui.description: The name of the channel to use. Must be defined on the queue manager. Specify this value if you are using below version 10 of IIB.

property-ui.label: Queue Manager
property-ui.description: The WebSphere MQ Queue Manager which the broker is using. Specify this value if you are using below version 10 of IIB.

property-ui.description: Username for secure authentication. Explicit user authentication only available with IIB 10.

property-ui.label: Password

property-ui.description: The file to use for trace logging. If not set trace logging will be disabled.

property-ui.label: IBM Integration Bus Version
property-ui.description: The version of IBM Integration Bus. This determines which API will be required. (i.e. 7.0.0.1, 8.0.0.1, 9.0.0.1, or 10.0.0.1)

property-ui.label: Jar Path
property-ui.description: The full path containing the specific jars required for your version of IBM Integration Bus. The jar files required for version 9 are com.ibm.mq.jar, com.ibm.jmqi.jar, ConfigManagerProxy.jar, and ibmjsseprovider2.jar (e.g C:\ProgramFiles\IBM\WebSphere MQ\java\lib\ConfigManagerProxy.jar:C:\Program Files\IBM\WebSphere MQ\java\lib\com.ibm.mq.jar:C:\Program Files\IBM\WebSphere MQ\java\lib\com.ibm.mq.JMQI.jar:c:\ProgramFiles\ibm\MQSI\9.0.0.1\JRE17\LIB\ibmjsseprovider2.jar)

property-ui.label: MQSIPROFILE Executable
property-ui.description: The absolute path to the mqsiprofile executable on your IIB server. Specifying this value will initialize your command environment. Only specify this path if your command environment needs initializing.

property-ui.label: Shell
property-ui.description: Path to your shell executable file.

step-type.name: Stop Message Flows
step-type.description: Stop Message Flows that are running.

property-ui.label: Execution Group
property-ui.description: Name of the Execution Group.

property-ui.label: Message Flows
property-ui.description: NewLine-separated list of Message Flow names to start.

property-ui.label: IP
property-ui.description: The ip address of the target server for a remote connection.

property-ui.label: Port
property-ui.description: The port of the target server for a remote connection.

property-ui.label: Use SSL
property-ui.description: Administration security authentication/authorization. This option is only available in IIB version 10.

property-ui.label: Integration Node Name
property-ui.description: Name of Integration Node. Specify this value to create a local broker connection.

property-ui.label: Channel
property-ui.description: The name of the channel to use. Must be defined on the queue manager. Specify this value if you are using below version 10 of IIB.

property-ui.description: The WebSphere MQ Queue Manager which the broker is using. Specify this value if you are using below version 10 of IIB.

property-ui.description: Password for secure authentication. Explicit user authentication only available with IIB 10.

property-ui.description: The file to use for trace logging. If not set trace logging will be disabled.

property-ui.label: IBM Integration Bus Version
property-ui.description: The version of IBM Integration Bus. This determines which API will be required. (i.e. 7.0.0.1, 8.0.0.1, 9.0.0.1, or 10.0.0.1)

property-ui.label: Jar Path
property-ui.description: The full path containing the specific jars required for your version of IBM Integration Bus. Version 10 requires the IntegrationAPI.jar (e.g. C:\Program Files\IBM\MQSI\7.0\classes\IntegrationAPI.jar). IIB Versions below 10 require both ConfigManagerProxy.jar and com.ibm.mq.jar (e.g C:\ProgramFiles\IBM\WebSphere MQ\java\lib\ConfigManagerProxy.jar:C:\Program Files\IBM\WebSphere MQ\java\lib\com.ibm.mq.jar)

property-ui.label: MQSIPROFILE Executable
property-ui.description: The absolute path to the mqsiprofile executable on your IIB server. Specifying this value will initialize your command environment. Only specify this path if your command environment needs initializing.

property-ui.label: Shell
property-ui.description: Path to your shell executable file.

step-type.name: Override Bar Properties
step-type.description: Overrides configuration properties inside a Broker Archive file. This step is not compatible with WebSphere Message Broker version 7.

property-ui.label: Bar File Includes
property-ui.description: New line separated list of broker archive files or patterns to include *.bar includes all bar files in the working directory.

property-ui.label: Bar File Excludes
property-ui.description: New line separated list of Broker Archives to exclude *.bar includes all bar files in the working directory.

property-ui.label: Properties
property-ui.description: A new line separated list of properties to set in the format name=value, or a Property file. (You must specify either Properties or a Properties File, not both)

property-ui.label: Jar Path
property-ui.description: The full path containing the specific jars required for your version of IBM Integration Bus. Version 10 requires the IntegrationAPI.jar (e.g. C:\Program Files\IBM\MQSI\7.0\classes\IntegrationAPI.jar). IIB Versions below 10 require both ConfigManagerProxy.jar and com.ibm.mq.jar (e.g C:\ProgramFiles\IBM\WebSphere MQ\java\lib\ConfigManagerProxy.jar:C:\Program Files\IBM\WebSphere MQ\java\lib\com.ibm.mq.jar)

property-ui.label: On Failure
property-ui.description: Choice of action when overrides fail on a particular bar file. (Fast Fail: Step will fail right away when an override failure occurs, and will not attempt to override properties on any additional bar files. Best Effort: Step will attempt to override properties on all bar files, and will fail at the end if any override failures occurred. Useful to pinpoint which bar files are invalid. Warn: Step will continue on if an override failure occurs, and print a warning declaring the bar file that failed.)
